SELECT dsale.salesdaily_num,uo.order_date salesdaily_date, b.book_num, b.BOOK_NAME salesdaily_book_name, b.book_cost salesdaily_book_cost, b.book_price salesdaily_book_price, uo.order_book_count salesdaily_quantity, b.book_price*uo.order_book_count salesdaily_total, uo.order_total_price salesdaily_pay, uo.order_total_price-(b.book_cost*uo.order_book_count) salesdaily_profit FROM salesdaily dsale, book b, userorder uo WHERE dsale.order_bunho=uo.order_bunho AND uo.book_num=b.book_num AND uo.order_date between to_date(#{salesdaily_date}, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{next_date}, 'yy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss')
